items.text: When a scale (ie, pinch) gesture is detected, then the scale factor is used to resize the ImageView.

items.text: Although the activity had the gesture detector in the example above, it could have also been set on the image view itself.

mScaleFactor = Math.max(0.1f, Math.min(mScaleFactor, 5.0f));
